name: Bonce Battle
description:
This game was created over a 5 day game jam. We were given one rule to follow; make the game a one button game. 

If you're wondering where the "U" in bounce has gone, well, so are we. One of our 2D artists can't spell, and the name just stuck.

We hope you enjoy playing!

With love,

Triple B Studios

PLAY INSTRUCTIONS

The space key is the only button you'll need to play this game. Hit space to send a shock-wave to the enemies, propelling them into the walls. Your aim is to knock them all out and be the last one standing. 

The center of the arena enables the player to fly into any direction they choose. Use it wisely!
